title: Wanted: Constable For Island Just One Fried Egg Short Of Paradise
teaser: Britain's Isles of Scilly seeks a new constable for the world's most cushy posting. Qualifications include knowing how to deal with wandering sea pups, catching speeding golf cars and saving goldfish.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
